attributes.action: Introduce A2 automatic upgrade to full A license after 2 years
attributes.additional_details: Reintroduction of full category A license entitlement after 2 years of holding a full A2 license to help free up DVSA examiners possibly with a 2 hour refresher course with an approved motorcycle training facility Just food for thought I can only see that the system is against younger motorcycle rider's having to pay for a CBT, theory test,A1,A2,A all costing in the £1000's I believe if we can safely show a level of competence in riding with an examiner through an A2 license then why do it again
attributes.background: Take back control of UK roads and stop following EU rules money making taking advantage of UK residents

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593355
